summary: Deadric Artifacts to be true as something made by Daedric Lords
descriptionHtml:
*SPOILER ALERT*
This mod might considered unbalance or overpowered. 
**

\"Questing heroes of all stripes seek after the fabled Daedric artifacts for their potent combat and magical benefits.\" -- Haderus of Gottlesfont, from Modern Heretics

Or so they say. The reality is whenever I got one of the Daedric artifact it feels like useless (except Azura Star) since I could craft much more stronger weapon or armor. Hence I made this simple mod to make Deadric Artifacts much stronger to be true as something made by Daedric Lords, not by some mortals.

Overview:
+ All weapon have unlimited charge.
+ Much much stronger enchantments.
+ Much much stronger damage and armor rating.
+ Change all improveable artifact to benefit only from Daedric Smithing perk.
+ Add all improvable artifact grindstone requirement to using 1 Daedra Heart. Since the artifact already overpower, it need at least additional rather hard to find ingredient to improve :p

For the changelog, click the link on latest version number.

Here\'s the full list of what this mod do on the latest version.

Spellbreaker:  
+ Ward now have 300 points ward power (instead of 50).
+ 2x armor rating

Mehrunes Razor:
+ 20% chance instant kill (instead of 1%).
+ 2x damage rating

Ebony Mail:
+ 50 points poison damage (instead of 10).
+ 2x armor rating

Dawnbreaker:
+ Unlimited charge
+ Killing undead will always activate blast effect.
+ Have 100 fire damage (instead of 10)
+ 2x damage rating.

Volendrung:
+ Unlimited charge
+ Absorb 200 stamina (instead of 50)
+ Have 25% chance to paralyze anything except dragons for 5 sec
+ 2x damage rating

Ring of Namira:
+ Increase max stamina by 200 (instead of 50)

Mace of Molag Bal:
+ Unlimited charge
+ Do 100 points absorbs stamina and magicka 

Rueful Axe:
+ Will have same swing speed as Deadric battle axe
+ Unlimited charge
+ Do 100 points stamina damage (instead of 20)
+ Do 20 points bleeding damage for 5 sec
+ 2x damage rating 

Masque of Clavicus Vile:
+ Have enchanment price 100% better (instead of 20%), persuasion 100% better (instead of 10%), regenerate magicka 150% faster (instead of merely 5%).
+ 2x armor rating

Savior\'s Hide:
+ Have 45% resist magic and 100% resist poison
+ 2x armor rating

Oghma Infinium:
+ Advance skill 20 level each (instead of 5)

Wabbajack:
+ Unlimited charge

Sanguine Rose:
+ Unlimited charge

Skull of Corruption:
+ Unlimited charge
+ Do 50 point damage, do 200 points damage if powered with dreams

Ebony blade:
+ Fix should be behave like greatsword and got benefit from two-handed perk tree.
+ Have 2x ebony greatsword damage.
+ 100 points health absobs when full potential unlocked (need 10 kills)
+ Fix lore, attack from Ebony Blade won\'t count as hostile.
+ Fix Ebony Blade now improvable using grindstone.

My other mods:
- Flesh Spell Fortify Unarmed Damage (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14361)
- Magic Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14825)
- Assasin Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14929)
- Shout Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14523)
- Craftable Scythes (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17821)
author: BtyoP

files.name: Daedric Artifacts Overlord v1_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Fix Skull of Corruption damage description
Change Mace of Molag Bal magicka and stamina damage enchantment to magicka and stamina absorbs.
Volendrung now has 25% chance to paralyze anything except dragons for 5 sec.
Fix Volendrung charge.
Tone down Ebony Mail poison damage to 50 points
Fix Ebony Mail poison damage description
Tone down Rueful stamina damage to 100 points, but add 20 damage per sec bleeding damage for 5 sec.
Fix Rueful Axe should have the same swing speed as normal Battleaxe.
